rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with natural light from the front windows.
Spacious living area with large windows for maximum natural light and ventilation. Vastu compliant entrance facing east.
Modern kitchen with ample counter space, ensuring proper circulation of air and light. Located on the eastern side for positive energy.
Adjacent to the kitchen with a view of outdoor space for natural ventilation and light.
Master bedroom positioned towards the north-west for serenity and positive energy. Ensures privacy and natural ventilation.
Additional bedroom with sufficient space, ensuring proper placement as per Vastu for balanced energy flow.
Dedicated quarters for staff, ensuring comfort and accessibility. Positioned in the rear of the villa.
Private gym integrated into the villa with ample ventilation and natural light from side windows.
Home theater designed for immersive experience with acoustics and controlled lighting. Placed in a quiet corner of the villa.
Study area integrated within the living space to maintain balance and promote productivity. Vastu compliant with a view of natural light.
Bathroom placed strategically near master bedroom ensuring privacy and adequate ventilation.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with the east for positive energy flow. Provides ample natural light.
Large windows along living room and kitchen walls to maximize ventilation and natural lighting.
Ventilation grills installed in bedrooms and bathroom for continuous air flow.
